author: Simon Difford
description: More a subtly fortified wine than a true "three and under the guest" Martini but delightfully so with sherry-like wine notes and faint botanical influences. Subtly refined. Despite the 'Vesper' name some will say that this should be stirred. Shake boldly on, but with good ice.
name: Reverse Vesper Martini
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
